chat_history.message:
Hello,
My Galaxy S21 5G is having the following problem:
Hello, 
The phone I bought doesn't hold a charge. Need to recharge it 3-4 times a day.
I had the battery replaced at a specialized store. New battery.
But it's not working. It's likely the phone itself
Thank you for your help,

The customer confirms that the article has not been damaged due to a fall or exposure to water, and has not been repaired by a third party.

Hello Hélène, you will find the return label attached to this email. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that best suits you for shipping your package. You will find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. Return preparation: 1. Follow these instructions to return an article here. 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, casing, and screen protector 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packing the article: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so that it is stable and does not move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case there's a problem during transport. Your return is ready to be shipped! We'll let you know when it arrives. We remain at your disposal, Customer Service Back Market, Customer Service Back Market

Hello ecomobile,

You received the product for repair on 06/07/2024. The time to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical problem. Without response with a tracking link valid before 13/06/2024, we will refund the customer.

Thank you for your understanding,

Marie-Ursule, from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still repairing the device. Will update you soon once we finish repairing the device. Thank you.

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
Autre.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still repairing the device. Will update you soon once we finish repairing the device.

Regards,
KW

Hi ecomobile,

We are waiting for the TN for today. 

Thanks for your help,

Marie-Ursule, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
